Using Ripe

Source: vignettes/ripe.Rmd
ripe.Rmd
library(ripe)

replicate


stats::runif(20)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=2,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.36504182 0.74608860 0.05988133 0.95840460 0.95238713 0.29740113
#>  [7] 0.31117534 0.19997171 0.21601481 0.46514873 0.35421815 0.22696295
#> [13] 0.51611792 0.45296935 0.61626721 0.74885376 0.35366276 0.40378668
#> [19] 0.11170719 0.23384634
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.71561139 0.46535536 0.55849147 0.54534347 0.39142167 0.75027512
#>  [7] 0.80671500 0.59999763 0.41611704 0.16806151 0.00338403 0.19363385
#> [13] 0.19390834 0.14739913 0.13049337 0.30852329 0.69389913 0.28459137
#> [19] 0.20342137 0.21447997

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=3,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.1986322 0.5482408 0.1826145 0.1601859 0.3395223 0.9055507 0.2753481
#>  [8] 0.1093739 0.0778154 0.6729072
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.32981357 0.93541073 0.30236575 0.08606718 0.51465589 0.83612730
#>  [7] 0.45844547 0.40848634 0.99590595 0.76162779
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>  [1] 0.12329536 0.40274763 0.82221241 0.86124055 0.12333967 0.10163766
#>  [7] 0.01415702 0.83752776 0.16659877 0.59204264

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=4,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.8467911 0.1907843 0.6082109 0.3261805 0.4682279
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.1050027 0.5333896 0.8942325 0.2508608 0.3711702
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.1782552 0.1225185 0.9320843 0.4297274 0.6784457
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.9772469 0.5960604 0.3846307 0.5983184 0.4110419

apply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(lapply, X=1:4)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.409867495 0.967157306 0.002812281 0.637606648 0.868492071
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.2999530 0.3411452 0.1936812 0.7207106 0.1445252
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.66943562 0.10970587 0.45726272 0.26461768 0.03744961
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.0239786 0.9998480 0.6386953 0.4337408 0.6809597

mclapply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(
    parallel::mclapply,
    X=1:4,
    mc.cores = 2)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.8702191 0.3779296 0.5164332 0.2076441 0.6322188
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.70826859 0.01590356 0.36683807 0.43351277 0.84742273
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.5333714 0.5087386 0.7917499 0.9311353 0.1983216
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.9804004 0.4592775 0.2408328 0.8364964 0.9454253

purrr

iris %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(5) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          6.1         2.8          4.7         1.2 versicolor
#> 2          6.4         3.2          4.5         1.5 versicolor
#> 3          5.5         2.3          4.0         1.3 versicolor
#> 4          5.4         3.7          1.5         0.2     setosa
#> 5          6.3         2.9          5.6         1.8  virginica
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.2         2.7          3.9         1.4 versicolor
#> 2          6.7         2.5          5.8         1.8  virginica
#> 3          6.3         3.3          4.7         1.6 versicolor
#> 4          6.3         2.3          4.4         1.3 versicolor
#> 5          4.6         3.6          1.0         0.2     setosa
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          6.5         2.8          4.6         1.5 versicolor
#> 2          6.7         3.1          4.4         1.4 versicolor
#> 3          5.9         3.0          5.1         1.8  virginica
#> 4          5.6         3.0          4.5         1.5 versicolor
#> 5          5.5         2.4          3.8         1.1 versicolor

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2) %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=1)
#> [[1]]
#>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1           5.9         3.2
#> 2           4.8         3.0
#> 3           5.7         4.4
#> 4           5.5         2.6
#> 5           5.4         3.9
#> 6           6.4         3.1
#> 7           5.4         3.7
#> 8           7.7         3.0
#> 9           5.5         2.4
#> 10          5.0         3.5
#> 11          7.9         3.8
#> 12          4.8         3.4
#> 13          5.1         3.7
#> 14          7.7         2.8
#> 15          6.0         3.0
#> 16          5.0         3.5
#> 17          4.8         3.0
#> 18          6.3         2.7
#> 19          6.4         2.8
#> 20          6.7         3.0

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2)%>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(1:5) %>%
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.0         3.4
#> 2          6.7         3.0
#> 3          6.0         2.7
#> 4          6.4         2.8
#> 5          6.8         3.2
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          5.4         3.0
#> 2          6.3         3.3
#> 3          7.1         3.0
#> 4          6.3         2.7
#> 5          5.2         3.4
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          5.5         4.2
#> 2          6.5         3.0
#> 3          5.1         3.8
#> 4          4.4         3.0
#> 5          5.4         3.9
